description.narrative: The development objective of the proposed project is to increase access, market relevance, and results orientation of supported skills development institutions in agreed priority areas.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Annual Work Plan and Budget | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than May 30 of each year prepare andfurnish to the Association, an annual program of activities proposed for implementation under the Project during the followingFiscal Year, together with a proposed budget for the purpose. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Environmental and Social Safeguards | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that the Project is carried out inaccordance with the provisions of the ESMF and RPF. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Fiduciary arrangements | Description :The Recipient shall, within three (3) months of the Effective Date, ensureand cause the National Council for Higher Education to appoint and thereafter maintain through-out the project implementationperiod a procurement specialist and a financial management specialist, all with qualifications and terms of reference satisfactoryto the Association to support the implementation of the Project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Independent verification agency | Description :For the purpose of carrying out the independent verification ofDLIs, the Recipient shall engage in accordance with the provisions of Section III of Schedule 2 of Financial Agreement, anindependent verification agent referred to under Part B (6) of the Project, under terms of reference, qualifications and experiencesatisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :31-Aug-2015

Finance Agreement :Institutional Arrangements | Description :The Recipient shall ensure and cause each of the Participating SkillsDevelopment Institutions to maintain throughout the project implementation period, a Project Implementation Team with staffing,terms of reference satisfactory to the Association and with adequate resources to carry out its functions under the Project. |Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Institutional Arrangements | Description :The Recipient shall maintain at the national level, throughout theproject implementation period, a Steering Committee and a Technical Committee with terms of reference satisfactory to theAssociation and with adequate resources to carry out its functions under the Project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Internal Audit | Description :The Recipient shall, within three (3) months of the Effective Date, ensure andcause LUANAR and Mzuzu University to appoint and thereafter maintain throughout Project implementation, internal audit units, withan institutional framework, staffing and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association, and with adequate resources to carryout their responsibilities under the Project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Internal Audit | Description :The Recipient shall, within three (3) months of the Effective Date, ensure andcause the University of Malawi to appoint and thereafter maintain throughout Project implementation, additional internal auditstaff, all with qualifications and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association to support the implementation of the Project.| Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Manual | Description :The Recipient shall prepare, in accordance with terms of referenceacceptable to the Association and furnish to the Association for its approval, a proposed Project Implementation Manual for theProject containing detailed administrative, procurement, financial management, safeguards, monitoring and evaluation procedures andarrangements for the Project. | Due Date :01-Aug-2014

Finance Agreement :Project Monitoring and Reporting | Description :The Recipient shall monitor and evaluate the progress of theProject and prepare Project Reports in accordance with the provisions of Section 4.08 of the General Conditions and on the basis ofthe indicators acceptable to the Association and set out in the Project Implementation Manual. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Monitoring and Reporting | Description :The Recipient shall prepare and furnish to the Association notlater than forty-five (45) days after the end of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financial reports for the Projectcovering the quarter, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Sub-project Grant Agreements | Description :The Recipient shall make each Sub-project under a Sub-project GrantAgreement between MoF and the respective Participating Skills Development Institutions on terms and conditions approved by theAssociation, specifying the DLIs to be met by the Participating Skills Development Institutions and means of verification and themaximum Sub-project Grant amounts payable against the outputs specified. | Frequency :Quarterly

title.narrative: Number of skills trainees from rural areas
Timely submission of annual implementation report by NCHE, detailing analysis of performance against targets
The Proportion of students/trainees who pass the annual assessment
Proportion of new intakes in priority areas to the overall new intakes in the participating institutions
A National Quality Assurance Framework (NQAF) developed
Development of targeted and functional students' loan scheme as per action plan by year 3
Proportion of graduates that the institution maintains contact with annually
Published Tracer studies as per Action Plan
Number of programs developed / curriculum revised with private sector participation as per IIP and imparted
Proportion of infrastructure targets met by participating institutions as per agreed IIP
Proportion of faculties selected for staff development programs returned to the institution after completing training and resumed teaching
Annual intake (enrollments) in the priority areas
